title: S’pore to establish nat’l council to set AI direction: PM
description: Singapore will establish a national council on artificial intelligence to provide “strategic direction” on the use of the new technology, Prime Minister Lawrence Wong announced yesterday.

title: UPDATE 2-OpenAI says China's DeepSeek trained its AI by distilling US models, memo shows
description: OpenAI has warned US lawmakers that Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek is targeting the ChatGPT maker and the nations leading AI companies to replicate models and use them for its own training a memo seen by Reuters showed

title: Rocket Companies Stock Slips Thursday On Zillow Sell-Off, AI Fears
description: Rocket Companies Inc (NYSE:RKT) is trading lower Thursday afternoon as investors continue to de-risk housing-exposed names following a sharp, negative reaction to Zillow Group Inc’s (NASDAQ:ZG) (NASDAQ:Z) latest quarterly update and a broader wave of selling across real-estate...

title: Samsung opens pre-reserve for next Galaxy AI phone in India
description: Customers can pre-reserve the new device by paying a refundable token amount of ₹999 starting todayThe post Samsung opens pre-reserve for next Galaxy AI phone in India appeared first on Greater Kashmir.

title: Scope for AI to help in justice system but care is needed, says prosecutor
description: “I can definitely see the potential for AI to help but we have to be really quite responsible around it"
